summary: Diff implements the requested global font loading and font classes (Playfair Display for headings, Poppins/Inter for body), applies the specified plumâ†’rose background gradient and romantic color tokens, updates buttons to use the new accent/muted rose palette, and updates GlassCard to a blush-tinted glass effect with a pink bloom pseudo-element. One acceptance criterion about preferring shared/global styling over one-off overrides appears not fully met due to inline styles on the Celebration replay button.

missing_requirements.requirement: All changes are implemented via shared/global styles (e.g., frontend/src/index.css and Tailwind theme tokens) rather than one-off per-screen overrides, except where necessary for layout.
missing_requirements.reason: CelebrationScreen applies secondary button styling via inline background/border styles instead of a shared/global class or token-based style, which conflicts with the stated preference for shared/global styling for palette updates.
